sample_2.title: Split a PDF document into multiple files
sample_2.content_1: Easily break a large PDF into multiple smaller files using the [Split Document](https://docs.groupdocs.com/merger/net/split-document/) feature. This helps with extracting specific sections or organizing content more efficiently.
sample_2.content_2: You can split documents based on various criteria, such as page range, specific start and end pages, or odd/even page numbers.
